generalInfo.briefDescription: Raised in a strict home, Ranjani found happiness solely in the company of four boys from her neighbourhood. As she grew up, their friendship meant the world to her. Can she find love while upholding their close bonds amidst family and social constraints?
generalInfo.title: Ranjani
generalInfo.description: Raised in a strict home, Ranjani found happiness solely in the company of four boys from her neighbourhood. As she grew up, their friendship meant the world to her. Can she find love while upholding their close bonds amidst family and social constraints?

generalInfo.briefDescription: Bound for over 200 years in a quest for indomitable power, an evil entity released by Anamika threatens her lover Nanda's life, setting off an age-old battle between good and evil.

generalInfo.briefDescription: Phool enters into wedlock with Shovon from a royal lineage solely to provide an heir. Follow Phool & Shovon as they embrace the power of love to save the royal dynasty, engulfed in a web of deceit amidst fear, betrayal & malevolence.

generalInfo.briefDescription: Things take a momentous shift when a bold & loving village girl, Radha, crosses paths with a doting father and his 6-year-old daughter, who yearns for a mother's love. Join the family's journey through the nuances of love, affection & parenthood.
generalInfo.title: Radha

generalInfo.briefDescription: Madhusri, the chosen one destined to destroy the evil forces with the ‘Swargavathil Pakshi’ & her great-grandmother’s spirit. Watch her battle to triumph in her sacred task as she confronts malicious enemies, after being bestowed the divine nose pin.
generalInfo.title: Swargavathil Pakshi

generalInfo.briefDescription: Bound for over 200 years, and in a quest for indomitable power, an evil entity that Anamika releases by ill fate threatens her lover Nanda's life and her boss Rishi's unrequited love for her. Setting off an age-old battle between good and evil.
generalInfo.title: Anamika

generalInfo.briefDescription: At retirement, Anjan Babu, an ideal family patriarch has successfully raised his children but now faces a financial crisis & endures their humiliation. Watch him guide the family through tough times with his youngest son & a caring maid for support.
